name: Noodles
description: Choice of meat: White meat chicken, beef, tofu, vegtable, or no meat
additional: Shrimp add $2.50, Combination(shrimp, beef, and chicken) add $2.50

items.name: Pad Thai
items.description: Pan Fried thin rice noodles with egg, bean sprout, green onion, and side with ground peanut.

items.name: Pad See Ew
items.description: Pan fried flat noodles with broccoli, egg, and sweet black sauce.

items.name: Pad Woon Sen
items.description: Pan fried silver noodles with eggs, onion, bean sprout, and mixed vegatables in cur speical sauce.

items.name: Chow Mein
items.description: Pan fried soft eggs noodles (yellow) with mixed vegetables in our special sauce.

items.name: Kai Kua (Chicken Noodles)
items.description: White chicken pan fried flat noodles with eggs, bean sprouts, ground peanuts and green onion.

items.name: Lad Nar
items.description: Pan fried flat noodles topped with broccoli, egg in special gravy sauce.

items.name: Pad Kee Mow (Spicy Noodles)
items.description: Pan fried flat noodles, onion, bellpeppers, carrot, chili, and basil, mixed with spicy chili sauce.

items.name: Spicy Spaghetti
items.description: Pan fried spaghetti with onion, bell peppers, carrot, chili, and bsasil mixed with spicy chili sauce.
